named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDER_BY_ORDER_NUMBER
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.orderNumber = :orderNumber

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_STATUS
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.status = :orderStatus

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDER_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.id = :orderId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_NAME_AND_STATUS
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.status = :orderStatus AND order.name = :orderName

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_NAME_NULL
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.status = :orderStatus AND order.name is null ORDER BY order.id desc

named-query.name: BC_READ_NAMED_ORDER_FOR_CUSTOMER
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.name = :orderName AND order.status = :orderStatus
